name: Is It There?
description:
You forgot to bring your tupperware from school and Mom's gonna get real mad. You return to school to find out you are not alone...

Controls:

A   D : Left & Right

W : Enter doors/stairs 

S : Hide

E : Collect items

Spacebar : Flashlight (control usage)

Mouse : Hover over items 

Credits:

Assets: Me! 

Sound & BGM : Freesound.org

For now, the game is in test play. More updates will be implemented in the future :)
